name: colony
description: Decompose complex tasks into parallel sub-tasks with independent verification - like a colony of AI workers
author: Matthew O'Riordan

commands.name: colony-plan
commands.description: Plan tasks from a brief - interactive task decomposition

commands.name: colony-run
commands.description: Execute tasks with smart parallelization and verification

commands.name: colony-status
commands.description: Show detailed status of a colony project

commands.name: colony-projects
commands.description: List all colony projects with summary status

commands.name: colony-quick
commands.description: Quick task execution from a simple prompt - auto-generates brief and tasks

agents.name: worker
agents.description: Execute a single task in isolation. Returns DONE, PARTIAL, or STUCK.

agents.name: inspector
agents.description: Verify a task was completed correctly. Returns PASS or FAIL.
